Articles.Content:
in the part menu there is no mk1 cockpit. i still have inline, but i can spawn a craft with it. i tried having steam check but it didnt work and its not in my recycle bin. i dont wanna reinstall cause ill lose all my mods and ships. what do i do?

 

nevermind, i found it. but its called "mk1cockpit(m)" instead of Mk1 Cockpit. any fix?

and its not in the command module section, what do i do
